game_description: This app is designed for healing and relaxation. In this app, you will experience " just keep running along the Ocean road". This experience, which may seem monotonous in some ways, may give your tired brain a break. If you have trouble sleeping or if your brain is tired, try using this app. This app also includes a rotating view function so that you can experience the app while lying down. Operation Description Left stick (up/down) (vertical rotation of viewpoint) Right stick (up/down) (Speed Change) LR Trigger(Brightness change) A button （decision / BGM change) B button （decision / Description On/Off) X or Y Button (BGM volume change)
review_1: The colors and music are nice and I like that you can switch between day and night. I wish there was a way to drive more slowly though, the car goes too fast in my opinion. Other than that, it’s a very basic experience with little to do and zero interaction.
review_2: Simple Relaxing Drive visualizer basically. I think this is a good app if you like to relax with a headset on. Throw this on and watch the traffic pass by for 5 mins as you reach a state of calm, lots of settings to change the speed and look up or down, plus 3 times of day. Not the best app ever but for free I like it. Featured in Oculus Quest Seated Games Video - https://youtu.be/Naxha7wgbDQ
